(DICE, Linked In, Career Builder, etc).·Analyze client requirements against candidate qualifications and submit candidates through   department managers and the Field Offices, VMS client representatives and/or Kforce internally.·Determine candidate’s compensation expectations to maximize probability of meeting needs of both the candidates and the client.·Package candidates in accordance with corporate standards and focus on the pipe-lining of candidates to senior/field recruiters and maintenance/grooming of consistent book-of-business.·Submit the prospects credentials to the respective client and/or field representative and obtain feedback/confirmation of prospects candidacy·Expert level of sourcing for qualified candidate. recommendations: April 7, 2017, Dereck reported directly to Ced

Ced is one of the best managers I've had the pleasure of working under in a very long time. He delicately walks the fine line of giving his people the space they need to be creative while maintaining a constant flow of constructive critiquing to keep them (and me) on track and successful. He maintained himself as a resource to me, keeping a very open-door practice and helping me succeed when and where he could. His own skills are superb as well, always leading by example and never asking his people to do anything he either isn't willing to or hasn't already has done. Ced isn't just a manager, he isn't a boss, he is a true leader that I would follow into any situation without question.
